title: Your Song
lyrics: It's a little bit funny, this feeling in side I'm not one of those who can easily hi de I don't have much money, but, boy if I did I'd buy a big house where we both could live If I was a sculptor, but then ag ain no Or A man who makes potions in A travelling show I know it's not much but it's the best I can do My gift is my song, and this one's for you And you can tell everybody this is your song It may be quite simple but now that it's done I hope you don't mind, I hope you don't mind That I put down in words, How wonderful life is while you're in the world
